entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Temperature rising to 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain changing to rain near midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Temperature rising to 7 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 14.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 60 in the morning. High 14. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early in the evening then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
